com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.content

Class NoViewContentMediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.marketing.UpsightContentMediator<com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.content.NoViewContentMediator.Model>
      • com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.content.NoViewContentMediator

  • public class NoViewContentMediator
extends UpsightContentMediator<com.upsight.android.marketing.internal.content.NoViewContentMediator.Model>
    The UpsightContentMediator that mediates content with data only. This is often used to send a data bundle to back a custom view implemented by the application.
